requirement.name: F:Virtual_Bank_Account
requirement.summary: The Custumer should be able to set up a virtual Bank account that holds values for money available to invest, and investments in each stock or mutual fund.

requirement.name: F:Bank_Account_Information
requirement.summary: Holds Customers Bank Account information for final investment stage, that will be sent with investment information.

requirement.name: F:Personal_Investments
requirement.summary: The Custumer should be able to see investments, whether they are going up or down.

requirement.name: F:Personal_Investment_Trends
requirement.summary: The Custumer should be able to graphically see personal trend of stock or mutual fund investment.

requirement.name: F:Personal_Investment_Recommendation
requirement.summary: The Custumer should be able to view possible future daily trends

requirement.name: F:Statistics_Personal_Investment
requirement.summary: The Custumer should be able to view statistics on stocks invested in over time of ownership.

requirement.name: F:Trend_Graphics
requirement.summary: Graphical view of trends of owned stocks and other stocks.

requirement.name: F:General_Stock_Statistics
requirement.summary: The Custumer should be able to view Statistics of all stocks individually over their life time.

requirement.name: F:Homepage_News
requirement.summary: After log in the Custumer should be able to view current high and low stocks in the world. Stock Exchange opening time and closing times.

requirement.name: F:Investment_Process
requirement.summary: Customer will enter this when he decides to make an investment and specifies the excact number of shares to purchase.

requirement.name: F:Investment_Preview
requirement.summary: Customer will be able view the potential investments that he/she has made.

requirement.name: C:Operating System
requirement.summary: This will be a Windows application only.

requirement.name: R:Checkout_Investment
requirement.summary: Checking out will produce a file that will be sent to the investment firm with all necessary information to finilaize the purchase. This will also update current bank information and available funds.

requirement.name: R:API_Call
requirement.summary: The Software has to be able to access the internet and the server of the API has to be running for any statistics or searches.
